item.title: Unfinished Business 83: Slightly sticky bottoms
item.description: Andy is back this week and so we did a handover episode of Unfinished Business. This week we talked about our different approaches to the podcast and what’s relevant to “business”. Andy found an interesting article on the BBC website about smartphone stress, so we talked about how we handle disconnecting when we go on holiday, and in our downtime at home. [ ](http://unfinished.bz/83)
